name: Happy Companies

commands.description: Pick who you want coach on
commands.title: coach-select

longDescription:
# Introducing Happy from Happy Companies

Your team and people can expect to receive coaching on communication, leadership development, management, and better teamwork. This coaching can be on your manager, coworkers, or even yourself.

## Key Features

- **Meeting Side Panel**: Add Happy to your meeting and receive communication advice and insights of participants based on their Happy Workstyle.
- **Coaching**: Use the `coach` command to receive daily insights and tips customized for your professional growth and well-being.
- **Specific Coaching**: With the `coach-select` command, get advice on how to effectively interact and collaborate with specific coworkers, building stronger, more productive working relationships.
- **Workstyle**: With the `workstyle` command, get the Happy Workstyle of a specific coworker to unlock powerful insights on how to communicate and collaborate more effectively.
- **Help Command**: Unsure of available commands? Use the `help` command to get a comprehensive list of all commands and their functions.

## How It Works

During a meeting in Meet, simply click the Apps button in the top navbar and select Happy Companies. Any participant in the meeting in a Happy Companies workspace will appear in the side panel when Happy Companies is selected. Click on a participant to view communication advice and insights based on their Happy Workstyle.

The Happy Companies bot proactively sends daily coaching tips and advice, ensuring you stay on top of your communication and personal development without disrupting your workflow.

## Why Choose Happy Companies?

- **Personalized Guidance**: Receive coaching tailored to your unique work style.
- **Improved Productivity**: Implement practical tips and strategies to enhance your efficiency and effectiveness at work.
- **Better Collaboration**: Learn how to better engage with your team members, fostering a more harmonious and productive work environment.

Visit Happy Companies to learn how Happy transforms people and teams.

For support, please visit our [help page](https://help.happycompanies.com/).
shortDescription: Happy delivers coaching and insights inside Microsoft Teams.

examplePrompts.description: The user wants to start a coaching session to receive guidance and insights.
The user is seeking assistance or more information on how to use the bot's features.
The user wants to explore different work styles and get recommendations on improving their work habits.
